DIV.NAME: CATEGORY1
DIV.TITLE: Category 1
DIV.META: Please select your primary category from the list below. Press NEXT to return to the previous page

DIV.NAME: CATEGORY2
DIV.TITLE: Category 2
DIV.META: Please select your secondary category from the list below. Press NEXT to return to the previous page

DIV.NAME: CATEGORY3
DIV.TITLE: Category 3
DIV.META: Please select your trinary category from the list below. Press NEXT to return to the previous page

DIV.NAME: PROFILE
DIV.TITLE: uBid Profile
DIV.META: Please fill out all the relevent information to launch to uBid.

INPUT.HELP: Origin Country
INPUT.NAME: merchant:ubid:country

INPUT.HELP: Statement of shipping restrictions (where will/will not the product be shipped to)
INPUT.NAME: merchant:zoovy:shiprestrictions

INPUT.HELP: Notices to bidders, for example disclaimers or special promotions
INPUT.NAME: merchant:ubid:notice

INPUT.HELP: The name of the person to contact for information about the product.
INPUT.NAME: merchant:zoovy:support_email

INPUT.HELP: Description of payment methods accepted for purchasing the product
INPUT.NAME: merchant:zoovy:payment_policy

DIV.NAME: ALPHA
DIV.TITLE: uBid Listing
DIV.META: You must have a registered uBid account in order to sell on the uBid Consumer Exchange.

INPUT.NAME: product:ubid:suggestedprice
INPUT.HELP: The price you'd like them to pay

INPUT.NAME: product:ubid:binprice
INPUT.HELP: The price a customer can pay to win immediately, requires 10+ feedback
The products weight in Ounces
INPUT.NAME: product:zoovy:base_weight

INPUT.HELP: Products Manufacturer
INPUT.NAME: product:zoovy:mfg

INPUT.HELP: Enter the manufacturers part number if applicable
INPUT.NAME: product:zoovy:mfgid

INPUT.HELP: List of everything that the buyer will need in order to make use of this product.
INPUT.NAME: product:zoovy:prod_requirements

INPUT.HELP: Extended information about a product (for example the dimensions of a TV)
INPUT.NAME: product:zoovy:prod_specifications

INPUT.HELP: Warranty provided to the purchaser of this product
INPUT.NAME: product:zoovy:prod_warranty

INPUT.HELP: Description of all items shipped to the purchaser of this product.
INPUT.NAME: product:zoovy:prod_shipcontents

INPUT.HELP: Used for your personal records, not required.
INPUT.NAME: product:ubid:cost
product:zoovy:shipping
INPUT.HELP: This should be an estimate of the shipping cost
The number of days to run the auction
INPUT.NAME: product:ubid:duration

INPUT.HELP: The minimum number of products purchasable by a single bidder.
INPUT.NAME: product:ubid:min_bid_qty

INPUT.HELP: The maximum number of products that a single buyer can purchase.
INPUT.NAME: product:ubid:max_bid_qty

INPUT.HELP: Bid Increment
INPUT.NAME: product:ubid:bid_inc_qty
product:ubid:startbid
INPUT.HELP: The price the bidding will start at

INPUT.NAME: product:ubid:base_price
INPUT.HELP: Bidding will stop when the price reaches this number

INPUT.NAME: merchant:zoovy:bid_inc_price
INPUT.HELP: The increment in dollars the price will increase with each bid.

INPUT.NAME: product:zoovy:reserve
INPUT.HELP: If the bidding does not reach the reserve price, you are not obligated to sell the item
Number of minutes after auction closes to wait for new bids
INPUT.NAME: merchant:ubid:goingperiod

DIV.NAME: OMEGA
DIV.TITLE: Review Listing
DIV.DISPLAY: There is nothing to review here.
